tagline: Simple disaster alerts in your language
heroSubtitle: AI-powered multilingual disaster alerts for everyone in India
realTimeDisasters: Real-time disaster alerts from trusted sources
explainAlertDesc: Paste any disaster alert and get it simplified in multiple languages
alertPlaceholder: Paste disaster alert text here... (e.g., 'Severe cyclonic storm over Arabian Sea, wind speed 120 kmph, expected landfall in 24 hours')
chooseLanguage: Choose your preferred language for viewing disaster alerts
locationAccess: Allow location access to receive alerts near you. Your location is never stored or shared.
pushNotifications: Receive push notifications for critical disaster alerts in your region
instantNotifications: Get instant notifications about disasters near you from trusted sources
complexTranslated: Complex disaster alerts translated into simple, actionable language
availableLanguages: Available in 8 Indian languages for maximum reach
steppByStepInstructions: Step-by-step safety instructions for every disaster type
joinThousands: Join thousands using ReadyIndia AI for disaster preparedness
crowdMonitorDesc: Real-time crowd density monitoring to prevent stampedes and ensure public safety
enableLocationDesc: Enable location access to get personalized crowd alerts near you
locationDenied: Location access denied. You can still view all crowd monitoring locations below.
liveViewDesc: Live view of crowd density and emergency alerts
geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser
unableToGetLocation: Unable to get your location. Please enable location access.
failedLoadLocations: Failed to load crowd monitoring locations
enableLocationForEmergency: Enable location access to use emergency alerts
selectEmergencyType: Select the type of emergency and provide details
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what's happening... (e.g., 'Too many people pushing near main entrance, people falling')
falseAlarmWarning: This will immediately alert nearby users and emergency services. Only use for real emergencies. False alarms can be dangerous and may result in penalties.
locationRequiredEmergency: Location access required for emergency alerts
selectTypeAndDescription: Please select emergency type and provide description
failedSendAlert: Failed to send emergency alert. Please try again.
overcrowding_desc: Too many people in small space
